price: 34. Maalinta (Qiyaame) kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey waxay ku qosli gaalada.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
